code: @Test public void test() throws Exception {     MyController controller = this.wac.getBean(MyController.class).     int initialCount = controller.counter.get().     this.mockMvc.perform(options("/myUrl")).andExpect(status().isOk()).     assertEquals(initialCount + 1, controller.counter.get()). }
@Bean public MyController myController() {     return new MyController(). }
@RequestMapping(value = "/myUrl", method = RequestMethod.OPTIONS) @ResponseBody public void handle() {     counter.incrementAndGet(). }
